Basis: No prohibited food ingredients identified; caffeine and botanicals within generally accepted use levels
Outstanding Obligations: Novel food assessment (if applicable); nutrition & health claim review; labeling compliance
Legal Source: European Food Safety Authority / Regulation (EC) No 178/2002

Basis: Ingredients generally recognized as safe (GRAS) or commonly used in energy drinks; caffeine below advisory limits
Outstanding Obligations: GRAS self-affirmation (if needed); structure/function claim substantiation; labeling compliance
Legal Source: Food and Drug Administration / FD&C Act

Basis: Ingredient status under GB standards and functional ingredient lists not fully verified
Outstanding Obligations: Ingredient inventory screening; filing or registration as health food if functional claims used
Legal Source: State Administration for Market Regulation / Food Safety Law of PRC
